data.actual_result: the button moves 3 times (one to the right one, then back and then again to the right one)
data.short_description: If you disable/enable to view a linked app on your profile the button switches twice.
data.steps_to_repro: - go to settings - go to connections - add a connection (or use an exist one) - turn the show on profile button to the other side - you see it will turn back and then it goes to the right side
